title: Not getting season rewards for defending myself?
body: I got reported by a 5 man team, twice in a row, for defending myself against their abuse. Sure, I swore at them, but I suffer from mental illness and anger easy when I'm told that I got boosted and that I'm shit. I now have a chat restriction, which means i wont get my rewards, and I heard that their entire team; all who abused me, didn't get a restriction. That's both hypocritical that I get no season rewards, and they do, BECAUSE I WAS DEFENDING MYSELF, and unfair that my case isn't read thoroughly enough to be seen that I wasn't in the wrong. And by the way, for people that are going to post on this and call me a whiner and insult me, you're literally proving my point on why this is unfair to me.
